text:
It’s small, but it’s open 24 hours and one can get most essential stuff here, even pet food.
For vegans/ vegetarians, there are plant-based milk options available, besides fruits and vegetables.

Selling expired milk. My son bought the HL milk during a promotion last Thursday with the CDC voucher. We did not took the receipt to be environmentally friendly. I drank without checking the date but today my elder son just told me the milk already expired last month 24 Feb. This is ridiculous and the worst is I had been drinking this for few days.
These really tell me not to trust the supermarket to sell fresh stuff, you must always check.
A great variety of Ramen, Chocolates and snacks are available

I came again 2023 and it has improve with more spaces to shop and line move fast.
How do you shop in a very crowded and tight places ? Price are good except very small
And long lines at cashier

I am a patron to this store and have seen recent positive and remarkable changes in the store. I think I should write a review on this to compliment the staff here! The stocks are well organized and price labels are placed correctly! Not to mention, the staff here are genuinely friendly and helpful too! Thankful to have this store at the convenience of walking distance from my house! Kudos to the team and keep it up!!
